name: RAIDEN SHOGUN
description: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, the exalted ruler of the Inazuma Shogunate. With the might of lightning at her disposal, she commits herself to the solitary pursuit of eternity.

name: YAE MIKO
description: The head shrine maiden of the Grand Narukami Shrine, she is a descendant of the Kitsune lineage. She is intelligent and cunning, and not a person to be trifled with.

name: KAMISATO AYAKA
description: She is the eldest daughter of the Kamisato Clan and the sister of Kamisato Ayato. Beautiful, elegant, and graceful, the common folk of Inazuma have nothing but praise for her.

name: Zhongli
description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

name: Ganyu
description: The secretary to the Liyue Qixing. The blood of both human and illuminated beast flows within her veins.

name: Xianyun
description: One of the Mighty and Illuminated Adepti of Jueyun, known as Cloud Retainer. Now, she has entered the mortal realm and is known as Xianyun.

name: Baizhu
description: The owner of Bubu Pharmacy in Liyue Harbor. He is rarely seen without his talking white snake, Changsheng.

name: Xiao
description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha".

name: Yelan
description: A mysterious person who claims to work for the Ministry of Civil Affairs. She is the owner of the Yanshang Teahouse.

name: Hu Tao
description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, a person vital to managing Liyue's funerary affairs.

name: Shenhe
description: An adepti disciple with a mysterious past. She was raised by Cloud Retainer.

name: Keqing
description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. She is a skeptic of the gods and believes that humanity should determine its own future.

name: Qiqi
description: A zombie resurrected by the adepti. She works at the Bubu Pharmacy and has a poor memory.

name: Jean
description: The Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius. She is always busy with her duties and maintains the peace in Mondstadt.

name: Diluc
description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unparalleled in every possible way.

name: Albedo
description: A synthetic human made by the alchemist Rhinedottir, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

name: Eula
description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for her joining the Knights remains a mystery.

name: Klee
description: An energetic and outgoing girl, Klee is the daughter of the intrepid and often-destructive adventurer Alice. She is a member of the Knights of Favonius, and has a penchant for bombs and explosives.

name: Mona
description: A mysterious young astrologer who has taken up residence in Mondstadt to avoid her master. She is knowledgeable and prideful, but also struggles with her finances.

name: Venti
description: A bard that came to Mondstadt from an unknown place. He sometimes sings outdated songs, and other times he sings new songs that have never been heard of before.

name: Nahida
description: The vessel of Buer, the current Dendro Archon. She is a gentle and kind-hearted deity who seeks to understand and protect her people.

name: Tighnari
description: A young researcher well-versed in botany who serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a warm and helpful person with a passion for knowledge.

name: Furina
description: The former Hydro Archon of Fontaine. She is a dramatic and flamboyant figure who loves to be the center of attention, but also carries a heavy burden.

name: Neuvillette
description: The Iudex of Fontaine and the leader of the Marechaussee Phantom. He is a calm, impartial, and powerful figure who judges both humans and gods.
demoVideo: "Neuvillette: To the Risers of the Tide"
